value.title: Guy in a Cube hanging out with Andy Leonard from DataDriven.TV

value.title: Hex Tile, DAX and narratives - Roundup #44
value.excerpt: Jason Thomas looks at how to create a Hex Tile Grid Map in Power BI. Bill Anton looks at how you can use DAX to accomplish a logical AND. Chris Webb uses DAX to create dynamic chart titles in Power BI. And, a new Power BI custom visual is available for natural language narratives.  Hex Tile Grid Maps

value.title: How to get and use custom visuals with Power BI
value.excerpt: I look at how you can use the Visuals gallery to get custom visuals and then import them into Power BI Desktop or the Power BI service, and then publish those reports to Power BI. value.title: How we do the Screen Capture
value.excerpt: This is how we do the screen capture for our YouTube videos. For Guy in a Cube, we use Camtasia made by TechSmith, but there are other options.
